job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtmusthavesltpgtltpgt at least years experience as a data scientistltpgtltpgt years experience with ms excel charts pivot tablesltpgtltpgt years experience with ms powerpointltpgtltpgt years experience with tableaultpgtltpgt years experience writing sql queriesltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtplussesltpgtltpgt experience with power queryltpgtltpgt experience with power pivot for excelltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtdaytodayltpgtltpgtthis position is onsite in stamford ct no remote opportunities are available insight global is looking for a data scientist to join a large telecommunications company in stamford ct this person will be joining a new organization within the company and will be a part of the reporting ampamp analytics team they will be responsible for identifying trends writing sql queries mining complex data and managing statistical data about of their day will be spent analyzing data using different data mining techniques such as clustering regression analysis decision trees and support vector machines the remaining of their day will be spent analyzing geographical data surrounding company competitors to assess the different services that are being offered and then creating models using tableau based on the companys needsltpgt
